timeline.message:
Add server side capability to search for all text exercises
Where the user has access to the course or is Admin
Enhance edit-text-exercise form to support importing exercises

Complete importing text exercises
The import is done by doing a hard copy of every entity and its child entities

Reduce redundant DB access
gradlew spotlessApply

Remove exam search appearences to fix visual bug.
Solving the bug in not in the scope of this PR and will be done in the PR which enables importing exercises into exams
Add grading instructions to TextExercise Import
Refactor code and reduce database access
fix bug when the pages displayed are unlimited and go beyond the boundaries of the container view
Merge branch 'feature/import-text-exercises' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-text-exercises

Refactor code, add Course title pipe for import modal.
URL check for Exam mode import
Add import text exercise to client
change db query to include exam exercises in the results
Fix missing routes for text exercise submissions for exam mode
Handle text exercise import for exam exercises
fix failing test by improving Exercise validation robustness
Merge branch 'feature/import-text-exercises' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-text-exercises

add integration tests for different imports
Course/Course Course/Exam Exam/Course Exam/Exam
fix bug when importing from exam exercise to course
Copy release and due dates during import, add client tests

Fix Merge Issues
Adapt Programming Exercise getAll function to work with modified modal. In this version of the modal, the number of pages are limited to 10 so that it stays within the container view
Add search functionality for modeling exercises

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/import-modelling-exercises
Resolved using the state from develop

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/AuthorizationCheckService.java
#	src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/AssessmentResource.java
#	src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/TextExerciseImportService.java
#	src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/TextExerciseResource.java
#	src/main/webapp/app/exam/manage/exercise-groups/exercise-groups.component.html
#	src/main/webapp/app/exam/manage/exercise-groups/exercise-groups.component.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/exercises/modeling/manage/modeling-exercise-update.component.ts
Add routes for modeling exercises in exams and make button textx consistent
Fix modeling exercise resolve handle reference, add exam and import cases to modeling-exercise-update.component

Html adaptation | Handle submission as import
Adapt the html for the import variant.
Call the respective service function for importing exercises

Add ModelingExerciseImportService
Refactor TextExerciseImportService
Create abstract Superclass ExerciseImportService
Add Exercise group to modeling exercise resolver and constructor
Add row button ModelingExercise delete handling
Merge branch 'feature/import-modelling-exercises' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-modelling-exercises
Add integration test for importing modeling exercises
Edit the checkModelingExercise function to check that exactly one of course and exercise group is set

Add more modelingExercise integration tests
spotlessApply
Make use of checkModelingExercise for importing execises
Merge branch 'feature/import-modelling-exercises' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-modelling-exercises

Change requests
Fix nullpointer exception
Fix display of example solution
Show create example modeling solution and submision button

timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, I wanted to move this function but it slipped my mind. Thank you :D I moved it to Exercise.java and renamed it since it is used by all exercises which allow imports.
See: 8982dcc

timeline.message: Lock exercise mode to ExerciseMode.INDIVIDUAL for exam exercises
Lock exercise mode to individual for modeling exercises

Rename function to better reflect functionality
copyResult to ==> copyExampleResult
Merge branch 'feature/import-modelling-exercises' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-modelling-exercises
